verses.verse: I beseech <WG3870> you therefore, <WG3767> brothers, <WG80> by the mercies <WG3628> of God, <WG2316> that you present <WG3936> your <WG5216> bodies <WG4983> a living <WG2198> sacrifice, <WG2378> holy, <WG40> acceptable <WG2101> to God, <WG2316> which is your <WG5216> reasonable <WG3050> service. <WG2999>

And be not conformed <WG4964> to this <WG5129> world: <WG165> but be you transformed <WG3339> by the renewing <WG342> of your <WG5216> mind, <WG3563> that you may prove <WG1381> what <WG5101> is that good, <WG18> and acceptable, <WG2101> and perfect, <WG5046> will <WG2307> of God. <WG2316>

For I say, <WG3004> through <WG1223> the grace <WG5485> given <WG1325> to me, to every <WG3956> man that is among <WG1722> you, not to think <WG5252> of himself more <WG3844> highly <WG5252> than he ought <WG1163> to think; <WG5426> but to think <WG5426> soberly, <WG1519> <WG4993> according as God <WG2316> has dealt <WG3307> to every <WG1538> man the measure <WG3358> of faith. <WG4102>
For as we have <WG2192> many <WG4183> members <WG3196> in one <WG1520> body, <WG4983> and all <WG3956> members <WG3196> have <WG2192> not the same <WG846> office: <WG4234>
So <WG3779> we, being many, <WG4183> are one <WG1520> body <WG4983> in Christ, <WG5547> and every <WG2596> one <WG1520> members <WG3196> one <WG240> of another. <WG240>

Having <WG2192> then <WG1161> gifts <WG5486> differing <WG1313> according <WG2596> to the grace <WG5485> that is given <WG1325> to us, whether <WG1535> prophecy, <WG4394> let us prophesy according <WG2596> to the proportion <WG356> of faith; <WG4102>
Or <WG1535> ministry, <WG1248> let us wait on <WG1722> our ministering: <WG1248> or <WG1535> he that teaches, <WG1321> on <WG1722> teaching; <WG1319>

Or <WG1535> he that exhorts, <WG3870> on <WG1722> exhortation: <WG3874> he that gives, <WG3330> let him do it with simplicity; <WG572> he that rules, <WG4291> with diligence; <WG4710> he that shows <WG1653> mercy, <WG1653> with cheerfulness. <WG2432>
Let love <WG26> be without <WG505> dissimulation. <WG505> Abhor <WG655> that which is evil; <WG4190> hold <WG2853> to that which is good. <WG18>
Be kindly <WG5387> affectionate <WG5387> one <WG240> to another <WG240> with brotherly <WG5360> love; <WG5360> in honor <WG5092> preferring <WG4285> one <WG240> another; <WG240>
Not slothful <WG3636> in business; <WG4710> fervent <WG2204> in spirit; <WG4151> serving <WG1398> the Lord; <WG2962>
Rejoicing <WG5463> in hope; <WG1680> patient <WG5278> in tribulation; <WG2347> continuing <WG4342> instant <WG4342> in prayer; <WG4335>
Distributing <WG2841> to the necessity <WG5532> of saints; <WG40> given <WG1377> to hospitality. <WG5381>
Bless <WG2127> them which persecute <WG1377> you: bless, <WG2127> and curse <WG2672> not.
Rejoice <WG5463> with them that do rejoice, <WG5463> and weep <WG2799> with them that weep. <WG2799>

Be of the same <WG846> mind <WG5426> one <WG240> toward <WG1519> another. <WG240> Mind <WG5426> not high <WG5308> things, but condescend <WG4879> to men of low <WG5011> estate. Be not wise <WG5429> in your <WG5216> own <WG1438> conceits. <WG3844> <WG1438>
Recompense <WG591> to no <WG3367> man <WG3367> evil <WG2556> for evil. <WG2556> Provide <WG4306> things honest <WG2570> in the sight <WG1799> of all <WG3956> men. <WG444>
If <WG1487> it be possible, <WG1415> as much <WG3588> as lies in you, live <WG1514> peaceably <WG1518> with all <WG3956> men. <WG444>

Dearly beloved, <WG27> avenge <WG1556> not yourselves, <WG1438> but rather give <WG1325> place <WG5117> to wrath: <WG3709> for it is written, <WG1125> Vengeance <WG1557> is mine; <WG1698> I will repay, <WG467> said <WG3004> the Lord. <WG2962>

Therefore <WG3767> if <WG1437> your <WG4675> enemy <WG2190> hunger, <WG3983> feed <WG5595> him; if <WG1437> he thirst, <WG1372> give <WG4222> him drink: <WG4222> for in so <WG5124> doing <WG4160> you shall heap <WG4987> coals <WG440> of fire <WG4442> on <WG1909> his head. <WG2776>
Be not overcome <WG3528> of evil, <WG2556> but overcome <WG3528> evil <WG2556> with good. <WG18>
